items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Other Free Resources

*   [SimpleBackups.com](https://simplebackups.com/) ‚Äî Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze). Provides a free plan for 1 backup.
*   [SimpleRestore](https://simplerestore.io) - Hassle-free MySQL backup restoration. Restore MySQL backups to any remote database without code or a server.
items.content_html:
Other Free Resources

  • SimpleBackups.com ‚Äî Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze). Provides a free plan for 1 backup.
  • SimpleRestore - Hassle-free MySQL backup restoration. Restore MySQL backups to any remote database without code or a server.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [gabriel2m (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/gabriel2m/gabriel2m-oh-my-zsh-theme) - Minimalist theme with decorators for the current directory and `git` status.
*   [lacerate (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/Petrushevsky-A/Lacerate-zsh-theme) - Minimalist theme with decorations for `git`, `hg` and python `venv` status.
items.content_html:
Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • gabriel2m (‚≠ê0) - Minimalist theme with decorators for the current directory and git status.
  • lacerate (‚≠ê0) - Minimalist theme with decorations for git, hg and python venv status.

items.title: Awesome Arcgis Developers
items.content_text:
### ArcGIS location services

*   [Basemap styles service (v1)](https://developers.arcgis.com/documentation/mapping-apis-and-services/maps/services/basemap-layer-service/) - Access streets, satellite, and other basemap styles for maps and scenes.
*   [Basemap styles service (v2)](https://developers.arcgis.com/rest/basemap-styles/) - Access multiples map styles, add places of interest, set labels languages, word views and more.
*   [Places service](https://developers.arcgis.com/rest/places/) - Search for businesses and geographic locations around the world with detailed information about each place.
items.content_html:
ArcGIS location services

  • Basemap styles service (v1) - Access streets, satellite, and other basemap styles for maps and scenes.
  • Basemap styles service (v2) - Access multiples map styles, add places of interest, set labels languages, word views and more.
  • Places service - Search for businesses and geographic locations around the world with detailed information about each place.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### CLI

*   [argparse (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/p-ranav/argparse) - Argument Parser for Modern C++. \[MIT]

### Containers

*   [parallel-hashmap (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/greg7mdp/parallel-hashmap) - A family of header-only, very fast and memory-friendly hashmap and btree containers \[Apache2] [website](https://greg7mdp.github.io/parallel-hashmap/)

### Reflection

*   [reflect-cpp (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/getml/reflect-cpp) - Serialization through reflection, including automatic field name retrieval from structs. \[MIT]

### Miscellaneous

*   [date (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/HowardHinnant/date) - A date and time library based on the C++11/14/17 <chrono> header. \[MIT] [website](https://howardhinnant.github.io/date/date.html)
*   [hedley (‚≠ê855)](https://github.com/nemequ/hedley) - A C/C++ header file designed to smooth over some platform-specific annoyances. [website](https://nemequ.github.io/hedley/)
items.content_html:
CLI

  • argparse (‚≠ê3.1k) - Argument Parser for Modern C++. [MIT]

Containers

  • parallel-hashmap (‚≠ê3k) - A family of header-only, very fast and memory-friendly hashmap and btree containers [Apache2] website

Reflection

  • reflect-cpp (‚≠ê1.5k) - Serialization through reflection, including automatic field name retrieval from structs. [MIT]

Miscellaneous

  • date (‚≠ê3.3k) - A date and time library based on the C++11/14/17 header. [MIT] website
  • hedley (‚≠ê855) - A C/C++ header file designed to smooth over some platform-specific annoyances. website

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [cargo-semver-checks](https://crates.io/crates/cargo-semver-checks) ‚Äî Scan your Rust crate releases for semver violations. It can be used either directly via the CLI, as a GitHub Action in CI,  or via release managers like `release-plz`. It found semver violations in  [more than 1 in 6 of the top 1000 most-downloaded crates](https://predr.ag/blog/semver-violations-are-common-better-tooling-is-the-answer/) on crates.io.
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • cargo-semver-checks ‚Äî Scan your Rust crate releases for semver violations. It can be used either directly via the CLI, as a GitHub Action in CI, or via release managers like release-plz. It found semver violations in more than 1 in 6 of the top 1000 most-downloaded crates on crates.io.
